Very fun and very satisfying. I greatly enjoyed solving the puzzles and their difficulty varying between the not-so-obvious ones in the regular gameplay, a bit more challenging ones in the advances maps and highly demanding ones in the challenge runs, if aming for better medals. I believe that everyone can find something they will enjoy here and the game setting with the intresting plot and superb dialogues (...monologues?) make it a very pleasing experience. 
And I absolutely adore the credits song, so there you go - my heart is won!

This game. This fuckin game. Once upon a time, a long as time ago, this was the last thing I ever acquired not legally. It was so good, I went out and bought it [strike]three[/strike] two times. Once on Xbox 360 (stand alone), again on 360 (Orange Box), and on PC (valve were giving it away free). Mind you, I didn't [i]intend[/i] to buy it [strike]three[/strike] two times, it just so happens that after I bought it standalone on 360 and some months later bought the Orange Box without realizing that OB came with Portal. Either way, I am not pissed off at all that spent money on it I didn't need to because it is that good.

Dear Valve: this is the game that made me start paying real cash money to buy games on PC.

FPS로 된 퍼즐 게임은 처음 플레이 했는데 매우 재밌게 플레이 했습니다. 마지막 엔딩을 찾아가는 길이 조금 복잡해서 인터넷 검색한 것을 제외하고는 플레이 하는 도중엔 공략 찾아보지 않았네요. 맵이 전반적으로 복잡할 수는 있으나 그렇게 어렵진 않았습니다. 잘 안 풀릴 땐 잠깐 넋 놓고 다시 주위를 살펴보면 클리어 방법이 보여서 좋았습니다.  난이도도 적당하고 조작감도 부드러운 편에 속하고 최적화도 잘 되어 있어 쾌적하게 플레이 했습니다. 이제 포탈2 클리어를 목표로 다시 열심히 퍼즐을 풀어야겠네요ㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅠ

This game is genius, this is probably my favorite puzzle game on the Steam market, and maybe favorite puzzle game period. Of course, these claims need evidence, and I have plenty. First off, the Portal Gun is such a great puzzle mechanic. Whether it's used for your own movement, or to move cubes, energy pellets, and other puzzle items. Moreover, the puzzles are the kind that you don't get stuck on for so long that you just give up and look it up online, but just enough to confuse you, but always have a some-what simple solution that needs to be uncovered. Next, I must talk about how this game is my favorite example of teaching with gameplay, not a long tutorial. In fact, this game basically has a tutorial in every chamber. Since you're learning about the game by playing it, it feels good when you figure everything out mostly on your own. Nextly, the story. This game has a VERY minimalist story, as it should for its short length. I feel like any more complicated or intricate of a story would have to be crammed into the game so tightly that it wouldn't feel like natural storytelling. Also, the music is very good, it has a great sci-fi feel to it throughout. Finally, (SPOILERS AHEAD) This game's twist is probably one of my favorite in gaming. The music is so fast paced and energetic, and it really strikes a feeling of fear and panic into you. Overall, this game is a monument in puzzle gaming. I give Portal a solid 8 / 10.

포탈이라는 게임은 정말 신기하더라고요. 일반적인 퍼즐 게임의 형태를 벗어나기 때문입니다. 기존의 퍼즐 게임이 뛰어다니거나 말 그대로의 퍼즐을 풀거나 하는 경우가 있지만 이 포탈의 경우에는 포탈에 들어가면 다른 한쪽으로 무조건 나온다라는 법칙을 이용해서 그 자체가 퍼즐이 되어버리더라고요. 목적지까지 가는데 단순히 포탈을 쏘아서 이동할 수도 있고 어떤 목적지는 버튼을 눌러야 문이 열리는데 그 버튼은 물리적으로 접근할 수 있는 공간이 아니기 때문에 포탈을 쏴서 버튼을 눌러야 하고 어떤 목적지는 존나 멀리 있고 존나 높이 있어서 수직 방향으로 포탈을 타고 수평으로 포탈을 나오는 조합을 하는 등 뛰어다녀서는 절대로 클리어되지 않을 퍼즐들이 포탈을 이용하니까 깨지는 그냥 퍼즐의 패러다임을 바꾸어 놓았다고 할 수 있죠.

진짜 게임 플레이로 놓고 본다면 하나의 혁명입니다. 그리고 이 게임을 해봤다면 반드시 2를 해보세요. 정말 포탈 시리즈는 반드시 추천합니다.

Juego de calidad ,como la mayoría de los de Valve.Simple e intuitivo, con puzzles creativos pero de una una dificultad demasiado baja.Es artística y jugablemente muy minimalista ,de estética fria como los laboratorios y pruebas que muestra.Tiene una historia nula pero que se compensa con una villana carismática y un buen giro argumental,pero  sinceramente  muy predecible. Su gran fallo es la duración ,que no supera los 80 minutos si tenemos más de media neurona.Recomiendo encarecidamente su compra,en especial en rebajas.8/10

Sehr gutes Spiel mit guten Rätseln, Charakteren, und einem klasse Humor. Die Rätsel sind fordern aber nicht unfair, der "Böse" im Spiel ist super gestaltet und das Spielprinzip ist etwas das es nirgends anders (außer beim Nachfolger) findet.Der einzige wirkliche negativ Punkt am Spiel ist sie Spielzeit von rund 2-3 Stunden. Es hat seinen unglaublich guten Ruf durchaus verdient und an jeden der es noch nicht gespielt hat: Die 2,50 investition während jedem Sale für BEIDE Teile der Reihe werdet ihr definitiv nicht bereuen!
